imdb.title: UQ Holder
imdb.plot: In the decade since the world became aware of the existence of magic, the world has undergone a massive upheaval. However, a boy named Touta lives in seclusion in a rural town far removed from these changes. His ordinary life is h...

episodes.title: Beauty and the Boy
episodes.plot: Tota is upset at his inability to control magic when all of his friends can. Meanwhile, Yukihime is attacked by a bounty hunter. Is Tota able to come to her aid?

episodes.title: You Can't Hate Someone You Meet Naked
episodes.plot: A new world is waiting for Tota and Yukihime, but outside of the quiet countryside, something dark is lurking. Meanwhile, has Tota made a new ally? Or a new enemy?

episodes.title: Palace of the Immortals
episodes.plot: Tota, Kuromaru, and Yukihime are off to the capital and the secret headquarters of the UQ Holders. What lessons will be learned there?

episodes.title: Invasion of the Assassins
episodes.plot: Tota gets his first assignment from Yukihime which is the perfect job for beginners but things do not go as they were planned.

episodes.title: Magia Erebea
episodes.plot: Tota, Kuromaru, and Karin are rendered helpless in the fight against the immortal hunters. When things seem hopeless, help comes from the most unlikely source.

episodes.title: Kuromaru's Dark Days
episodes.plot: The gang learns something about Kuromaru that must be kept secret from Tota. Meanwhile, they find trouble while they are out on the town.

episodes.title: Reset and Restart
episodes.plot: After Tota is on his date with Kuromaru, he meets Kirie in the city but she does something that he doesn't expect which sets off a series of interesting events.

episodes.title: Operation: Capture Fate
episodes.plot: The story of Tota's grandad unfolds as his past seems to be shrouded by mystery. But will Tota's questions be answered?

episodes.title: Love, Baths, and Vigorous Exercise
episodes.plot: A surprising rivalry of love between the girls ensues, as Tōta uncovers more about his cryptic grandfather's past.

episodes.title: Welcome to Mahora Academy
episodes.plot: Tota's lackluster mood rapidly sharpens when he enters the Mahora Academy.

episodes.title: Her Love Story
episodes.plot: Yukihime unravels her stories of her fruitful past, while Tōta is entrapped in another world where his only power is his mind.

episodes.title: Adeat! Everlasting Love
episodes.plot: The time has come for Tōta to make his ever lasting decision but will it be the right choice?
